original_text: This is what the Lord says to his people: ‘I promise you that you will rule Egypt and Ethiopia, and also those tall people from Seba. They will bring to you the things that they buy and sell. Those valuable things will belong to you. They will walk behind you in chains, as your slaves. They will bend down low in front of you, and they will even pray to you. They will agree, “Surely God is with you. There is nobody else like him. There is no other God.” ’ This is what the Lord says to his people: ‘I promise you that you will rule Egypt and Ethiopia, and also those tall people from Seba. They will bring to you the things that they buy and sell. Those valuable things will belong to you. They will walk behind you in chains, as your slaves. They will bend down low in front of you, and they will even pray to you. They will agree, “Surely God is with you. There is nobody else like him. There is no other God.” ’ This is what the Lord says to his people:
korean_text: 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시되 애굽의 소득과 구스가 무역한 것과 스바의 장대한 남자들이 네게로 건너와서 네게 속할 것이요 그들이 너를 따를 것이라 사슬에 매여 건너와서 네게 굴복하고 간구하기를 하나님이 과연 네게 계시고 그 외에는 다른 하나님이 없다 하리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says to his people
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 주께서 그의 백성에게 하시는 말씀입니다

sentences.original_text: I promise you that you will rule Egypt and Ethiopia
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 약속하노니 너희가 애굽과 구스를 다스릴 것이라

sentences.original_text: and also those tall people from Seba
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 세바라는 곳의 그 키 큰 사람들도 다스릴 것이라

sentences.original_text: They will bring to you the things that they buy and sell
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 사고파는 물건들을 너희에게 가져올 것이라

sentences.original_text: Those valuable things will belong to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그 귀중한 것들이 너희의 것이 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: They will walk behind you in chains
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 쇠사슬에 묶여 너희 뒤에서 따라올 것이라

sentences.original_text: as your slaves
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 종으로서

sentences.original_text: They will bend down low in front of you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너희 앞에서 몸을 낮출 것이라

sentences.original_text: and they will even pray to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 심지어 너희에게 기도할 것이라

sentences.original_text: They will agree
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이렇게 말할 것이라

sentences.original_text: Surely God is with you
sentences.korean_translation: 진실로 하나님이 너와 함께 계시다

sentences.original_text: There is nobody else like him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 같은 이는 없다

sentences.original_text: There is no other God
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 신은 없다

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says to his people
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 주께서 그의 백성에게 하시는 말씀입니다

sentences.original_text: There is nobody else like him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 같은 이는 없다

sentences.original_text: There is no other God
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 신은 없다

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says to his people
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 주께서 그의 백성에게 하시는 말씀입니다
